channel.title: Methodologies on Felix B
channel.description: Recent content in Methodologies on Felix B

item.title: Software Methodologies
item.description: Two types: Plan-driven and Agile. All processes involve: Software specification - What the software should do Design and implementation - How it should be organised and implemented Validation - Checking it does what the customer asked Evolution - Changing the software over time Software specification Define which services are required and limitations of the system Idea: Create a document that anyone could use to build the system Stages of requirements engineering:
